headline: 3M Company (MMM) Soars to All-Time High on Strong Sales, Upbeat Outlook
summary: We recently published 10 Stocks Leaving Wall Street in the Dust. 3M Company (NYSE:MMM) is one of the best performers on Tuesday. 3M Company soared to a new all-time high on Tuesday, as investor sentiment was boosted by improved sales performance in the third quarter of the year, supported by a higher growth outlook. During […]

headline: Netflix, 3M, Applovin: Top Analyst Calls
summary: Yahoo Finance senior reporter Allie Canal keeps track of several Wall Street analyst calls on top trending stocks, including calls around shares of streaming giant Netflix (NFLX) after it reported third quarter earnings on Tuesday, 3M (MMM), and Applovin (APP). To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Catalysts.

headline: Morgan Stanley lifts 3M rating, sees a more constructive setup
summary: Investing.com -- Morgan Stanley has upgraded 3M (NYSE: MMM) to Equal-weight from Underweight and raised its price target for the stock to $160 from $130, saying that softer expectations, a lower valuation, and early signs of a management-led turnaround create a “more constructive” setup for the stock.

headline: Jim Cramer Calls 3M “Sleeper Dow Stock”
summary: 3M Company (NYSE:MMM) is one of the stocks in Jim Cramer’s recent game plan.
